CustomField.description: Anonymous Apex script to execute. Your script must include a method definition for `void execute( List<Map<String, Object>> sourceRecordsBatch )`, which will be passed the current batch of source records. Your script is invoked once per batch just like the `execute` method of a Batchable class. Unlike a Batchable class, no state is preserved within the script between executions.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Anonymous Apex script to execute. Your script must include a method definition for `void execute( List<Map<String, Object>> sourceRecordsBatch )`, which will be passed the current batch of source records. No script state is preserved between executions.
CustomField.label: Target Apex Script
